name: thaw-angular-service-library

directories.// bin: It is an error to specify both bin and directories.bin
directories.// doc: Put markdown files in the directories.doc directory

scripts.all: npm run travis && npm run pack-and-deploy
scripts.// allw: rmdir /Q /S coverage & rmdir /Q /S dist & npm run lint & npm run ng-lint & npm run prettiercheck & ng build --prod & ng-packagr -p ng-package.json & cd dist & npm pack & cd .. & move /Y dist\thaw-angular-service-library-*.tgz C:\git\npm-packages\
scripts.build-and-test-core: npm run clean-build-products && npm run lint-and-build
scripts.// build-and-test-offline: npm run build-and-test-core && npm run systemtests-offline
scripts.// build-and-test-online: npm run reinstall-packages && npm run build-and-test-core && npm run e2e-online
scripts.build-and-test-online: npm run reinstall-packages && npm run build-and-test-core
scripts.packit: npm run packagr && cd dist && npm pack && cd ..
scripts.pack-and-deploy: ng build --prod && npm run packit && npm run deploy
scripts.pack-and-publish: ng build --prod && npm run packagr && npm publish dist
scripts.lint-and-build: npm run lint && npm run ng-lint && npm run prettiercheck && npm run build && npm run unittests
scripts.// e.g. gen: npm run gen-module modules/price-macd-signal-charts-canvases; npm run gen-component modules/price-macd-signal-charts-canvases
scripts.loc: git ls-files | grep -v package-lock.json | tr -d '\r' | tr '\n' '\0' | xargs -0 wc -l
scripts.// re: npm run format && npm run build-and-test-core && npm run e2e-online && npm run pack-and-deploy
scripts.re: npm run format && npm run build-and-test-core && npm run pack-and-deploy
scripts.f: npm run format && npm run all

// bundledDependencies: ... is an array of package names
author: Tom Weatherhead <thaw@2hrd4u.org> (https://github.com/tom-weatherhead)
